titles.title: Mentoring and Supporting Families Act

To provide for the use of peer support, peer mentoring, and career coaching in demonstration projects conducted under the health profession opportunity grant program under section 2008 of the Social Security Act.
Mentoring and Supporting Families Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Mentoring and Supporting Families Act This bill establishes demonstration projects for peer support, mentoring, and career coaching under the health profession opportunity grants program. Specifically, the Administration for Children and Families (ACF) must award grants to for such programs that include case management plans that help participants develop workforce skills on an ongoing basis. The ACF also must give preference to project applications that provide participants with a cash stipend.
